text: Throughout the neural engineering unit, you will keep a learning journal called a Learning Journal.
At the end of each lesson, you will be asked to add a journal entry to track your learning throughout the unit.
To start your journal, click on "My Work" >> "Learning Journals"
Click on "My First Learning Log" and click "Edit" in the top right of the pane.
Then, come back to this tab, drag the template below into your workspace, and answer the following questions.
What do you like about CLUE and Dataflow?
What kind of questions do you have?
